actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to limit the authority of local educational agencies to use Federal funds received under title I for construction of a school facility to cases in which no reusable closed public school facility is within two miles of the proposed school facility.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to prohibit local educational agencies from using Federal funds provided to meet special educational needs of children for construction of a school facility if there is a closed public school facility within two miles of the proposed school facility that could be renovated to provide education at one-half of the proposed construction cost.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to limit the authority of local educational agencies to use Federal funds received under title I for construction of a school facility to cases in which no reusable closed public school facility is within two miles of the proposed school facility.
